entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[DQC.US.0195.10626] The filer has used the concept us-gaap:SharesIssued with a value of 32,523,516 and has also used the value us-gaap:SharesOutstanding with a value of 32,293,042 both using the common stock member. The filer should report one or the other but not both when using the common stock member. If the column representing shares in the Changes in equity represents issued shares then the SharesOutstanding elememnt should not be used with the common stock member. If the column representing shares in the Changes in equity represents outstanding shares then the SharesIssued element should not be used with the common stock member.
The properties of this us-gaap:SharesIssued fact are: Period :2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : shares Rule Element Id:10626 Rule version: 26.0.9 - vel-20241231.htm 10236
